parameters.name: CpuAlarmThreshold
parameters.description: The alert threshold for CPU utilization. Unit: percentage.

parameters.name: DiskAlarmThreshold
parameters.description: The alert threshold for disk usage. Unit: percentage.

parameters.name: DuAlarmThreshold
parameters.description: The alert threshold for DTS Unit (DU) usage. Unit: percentage.

parameters.name: MemAlarmThreshold
parameters.description: The alert threshold for memory usage. Unit: percentage.

parameters.name: NoticeSwitch
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the alert feature. Valid values:

*   **1**: enables the alert feature.
*   **0**: disables the alert feature.

parameters.name: Phones
parameters.description: The mobile phone number to which alerts are sent. Separate multiple mobile phone numbers with commas (,).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the Data Transmission Service (DTS) instance resides.
